actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 10 of title 36, United States Code, to define the "Star Spangled Banner."

summary.text: States that the "Star-Spangled Banner" shall consist of the words and music as composed by Francis Scott Key and arranged by Thomas Carr.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 10 of title 36, United States Code, to define the "Star Spangled Banner."
